pull.title: test: Check that wait_until returns if time point is in the past
pull.body: Add an explicit regression test for the condvar bug (#18227), so that this doesn't happen again

events.message: test: Check that wait_until returns if time point is in the past

events.body: In the case where this doesn't hold, this test would wait forever, correct?
I can't say what happens if this doesn't hold. Boost for example would throw an exception and thus crash the program.

ACK fab7d14ea5a4305317d66f35beb3225a07823d42
Despite fail-behavior being unpredictable, having a test is much better than not having one.
